marklogic.body: I'm really tired of y'all's thinly disguised antagonism that you are trying to pass Off as concern for the overweight.Â If you really have had health issues yourself, you know that it does not help when people say nasty things about your weight.Â If anything, that just causes people with Eating problems to eat more.Â I have to wonder where all your antagonism comes from.Â You sound like people who can only feel better about themselves by bashing others.Â And that is neither healthy, nor admirable.Â Work on your own attitudes and character before you criticize anyone else.
